body.name: U Shaped Desk with File Drawer, 82.6" U Shaped Desk, Computer Desk with Power Outlet, Home Office Desk with Monitor Shelf, Printer Storage Shelves, Gaming Desk,Brown
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 3 hrs 19 mins
features: Versatile U-shaped desk-Introducing the WASAGUN U-shaped computer desk, the perfect solution for creating a productive and organized work or gaming space. This versatile desk features a simple yet functional design, offering a wide range of features to meet all your needs.

Ample storage space-With its 3 large desktops, file drawers, monitor shelf, open storage shelves, power outlet, and CPU stand, this desk provides ample storage space to keep your workspace tidy and clutter-free. The file drawer can hold letter/A4/legal size files, while the open shelves are perfect for storing printers, scanners, and other office machines within easy reach.

Ergonomic design for health-The ergonomic monitor shelf is designed to reduce back and neck pressure, promoting a healthier working posture. It also leaves plenty of space on the esktop, ensuring a spacious and organized workspace. Additionally, the monitor shelf can be used to store books, paper towels, sticky notes, pens, and other small essentials.

Convenient charging port-For added convenience, the desk includes a charging station with 4 outlets and 2 USB ports. This allows you to charge up to 6 devices simultaneously, such as cell phones, tablets, and Bluetooth speakers, keeping your devices powered and within reach.

With its sleek and contemporary design, the WASAGUN Computer Desk effortlessly blends functionality with style. Its clean lines, smooth finish, and minimalist aesthetics make it a perfect fit for any modern home office or workspace. This desk not only enhances your productivity but also adds a touch of sophistication to your overall decor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This table is easy to assembly even when alone. It is sturdy for when I’m working and it has nice sleek black color. There are lots of compartments for me to store my stuff and I can stretch out and comfortable since this table is very large. Plus this table has LED lights that come in many different colors and are easily controllable. Overall, this is a great table to buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very solid desk
reviews.reviewText: I am a very particular person about desks especially because I work from home and I am in school. This was the best desk I ever had. The instructions weren’t too bad . The only problem is I broke the drawer sliders (will message seller for replacements). Otherwise this desk is very solid I love that the desk itself has its own outlets as well as a ton of storage underneath and drawer. I use a 27 inch monitor (vertical) and a 34 extra wide curved monitor with a laptop and I still have a ton of space. Even when I rock the desk the foundation is sturdy. I recommend EVERYONE who has the space to buy this desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: In love with this desk!!! A lot bigger than i thought it would be! Very easy to put together (other than the drawer. That kicked my butt**hint the slider thingy comes apart to put the drawer together on**)! Very nice quality! Sooo much room! Delivered on time! (At 7 am in the freezing snow. TYTY Ups) Would buy again!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My children absolutely love it. Super spacious for the kids to do their homework on, while still having space to put their Legos on for decoration. It's also big enough to put a PC or any laptop while still having space for you to do work on. It even comes with built in light. My children love it especially comparing to the previous table I bought it was never big enough. I was worried about assembling it considering the size of it, but it was unnecessary very easy to assemble. Would definitely reccomend if you have alot kids that need a space to do work on or if you need a office desk that is spacious enough to put all ur papers and electronics on!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very good quality, very practical, highly recommended to buy, good use of space, ready to buy a computer, better office

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The desk was easy to assemble and is very sturdy. I like the flexibility of configurations. Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this functional desk！
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love this desk! I needed a desk that had a spot for a printer, a keyboard shelf, and also included a file cabinet drawer. This desk satisfied those needs at a price I can live with. I needed to upgrade from a smaller L-shaped desk to one that could accommodate two workstations. This desk is very functional. The desktop outlets shelves drawer are great feature. Setup was very simple with two people. Wonderful desk for the price and would highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptional Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: I reviewed countless desks before deciding on the WASAGUN U Shaped Desk. The instructions are well done and the recommendation of an electric screwdriver is seconded (specifically for the drawer sides and slides).I did have one damaged component. I contacted WASAGUN customer service via email listed in the instructions. After a few pictures and discussion, they offered to send a NEW desk in order to provide the replacement. I was extremely pleased with their willingness to provide a high level of customer service. I actually plan to take part of the second desk and make a couch table out of it.
